Structs/VoluntaryExit.html#/epoch.name: epoch
Structs/VoluntaryExit.html#/epoch.abstract: Minimum epoch at which this exit can be included on chain. Helps prevent accidental/nefarious use in chain reorgs/forks.

Structs/VoluntaryExit.html#/signature.name: signature
Structs/VoluntaryExit.html#/signature.abstract: Signature of the VoluntaryExit by the pubkey associated with the

Structs/Transfer.html#/sender.name: sender
Structs/Transfer.html#/sender.abstract: Validator index of the sender of funds.

Structs/Transfer.html#/recipient.name: recipient
Structs/Transfer.html#/recipient.abstract: Validator index of the recipient of funds.

Structs/Transfer.html#/fee.name: fee
Structs/Transfer.html#/fee.abstract: Fee in Gwei to be paid to the block proposer for including the transfer.

Structs/Transfer.html#/slot.name: slot
Structs/Transfer.html#/slot.abstract: The specific slot that this signed Transfer can be included on chain. prevents replay attacks.

Structs/Transfer.html#/pubkey.name: pubkey
Structs/Transfer.html#/pubkey.abstract: The withdrawal pubkey of the sender. The hash of this pubkey must match the senders withdrawalCredentials.

Structs/Transfer.html#/signature.name: signature
Structs/Transfer.html#/signature.abstract: The signature of the Transfer signed by the transfer.pubkey.

Structs/ProposerSlashing.html#/proposerI.name: proposerIndex
Structs/ProposerSlashing.html#/proposerI.abstract: ValidatorIndex of the validator to be slashed for double proposing.

Structs/ProposerSlashing.html#/header1.name: header1
Structs/ProposerSlashing.html#/header1.abstract: The header of the first of the two slashable beacon blocks.

Structs/ProposerSlashing.html#/header2.name: header2
Structs/ProposerSlashing.html#/header2.abstract: The header of the second of the two slashable beacon blocks.

Structs/Deposit.html#/proof.name: proof
Structs/Deposit.html#/proof.abstract: The merkle proof against the BeaconState current Eth1Data.root

Structs/Deposit.html#/data.name: data
Structs/Deposit.html#/data.abstract: The DepositData submit to the deposit contract to be verified using the proof against the deposit root.

Structs/AttesterSlashing.html#/attestati.name: attestation1
Structs/AttesterSlashing.html#/attestati.abstract: The first of the two slashable attestations. Note that this is in “indexed” form.

Structs/AttesterSlashing.html#/attestati.name: attestation2
Structs/AttesterSlashing.html#/attestati.abstract: The first of the two slashable attestations. Note that this is in “indexed” form.

Structs/Attestation.html#/aggregationBit.name: aggregationBits
Structs/Attestation.html#/aggregationBit.abstract: Stores a single bit for each member of the committee assigning a value of 1 to each validator that participated

Structs/Attestation.html#/data.name: data
Structs/Attestation.html#/data.abstract: The AttestationData that was signed by the validator or committee of validators.

Structs/Attestation.html#/custodyBits.name: custodyBits
Structs/Attestation.html#/custodyBits.abstract: Represents each committee member’s “proof of custody” bit (0 if non-participating).

Structs/Attestation.html#/signature.name: signature
Structs/Attestation.html#/signature.abstract: The aggregate BLS signature of the data.

Structs/Eth1Data.html#/depositRoot.name: depositRoot
Structs/Eth1Data.html#/depositRoot.abstract: The SSZ List hash_tree_root of the deposits in the deposit contract.

Structs/Eth1Data.html#/depositCount.name: depositCount
Structs/Eth1Data.html#/depositCount.abstract: The number of deposits that have occured thusfar.

Structs/Eth1Data.html#/blockHash.name: blockHash
Structs/Eth1Data.html#/blockHash.abstract: The eth1 block hash that contained the deposit_root. This block_hash

Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/slot.name: slot
Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/slot.abstract: The slot for which this block is created. Must be greater than the slot of the block defined by parentRoot.

Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/parentRo.name: parentRoot
Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/parentRo.abstract: The block root of the parent block, forming a block chain.

Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/stateRoo.name: stateRoot
Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/stateRoo.abstract: The hash root of the post state of running the state transition through this block.

Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/signatur.name: signature
Structs/BeaconBlockHeader.html#/signatur.abstract: Signature of the block by the block proposer.

Structs/BeaconBlockBody.html#/randaoReve.name: randaoReveal
Structs/BeaconBlockBody.html#/randaoReve.abstract: The signature of the current epoch (by the block proposer) and,

Structs/BeaconBlockBody.html#/eth1Data.name: eth1Data
Structs/BeaconBlockBody.html#/eth1Data.abstract: A vote on recent data the Eth1 chain.

Structs/BeaconBlockBody.html#/graffiti.name: graffiti
Structs/BeaconBlockBody.html#/graffiti.abstract: This is a space for validators to decorate as they choose. It has no define in-protocol use.

Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/slot.name: slot
Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/slot.abstract: The slot for which this block is created. Must be greater than the slot of the block defined by parentRoot.

Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/parentRoot.name: parentRoot
Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/parentRoot.abstract: The block root of the parent block, forming a block chain.

Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/stateRoot.name: stateRoot
Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/stateRoot.abstract: The hash root of the post state of running the state transition through this block.

Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/body.name: body
Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/body.abstract: Contains all of the aforementioned beacon operations objects as well as a few supplemental fields.

Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/signature.name: signature
Structs/BeaconBlock.html#/signature.abstract: Signature of the block by the block proposer.

Structs/AttestationData.html#/beaconBloc.name: beaconBlockRoot
Structs/AttestationData.html#/beaconBloc.abstract: Block root of the beacon block seen as the head of the chain at the assigned slot.

Structs/AttestationData.html#/source.name: source
Structs/AttestationData.html#/source.abstract: The most recent justified checkpoint in the BeaconState at the assigned slot.

Structs/AttestationData.html#/target.name: target
Structs/AttestationData.html#/target.abstract: The checkpoint attempting to be justified (the current epoch and epoch boundary block).

Structs/AttestationData.html#/crosslink.name: crosslink
Structs/AttestationData.html#/crosslink.abstract: The crosslink attemping to be formed for the assigned shard.

Structs/AttestationData.html.name: AttestationData
Structs/AttestationData.html.abstract: AttestationData is the main component that is signed by each validator.

Structs/BeaconBlock.html.name: BeaconBlock
Structs/BeaconBlock.html.abstract: This can be thought of as the main container/header for a beacon block.

Structs.html#/DepositData.name: DepositData
Structs.html#/DepositData.abstract: The DepositData submit to the deposit contract to be verified using the proof against the deposit root.

Structs/Eth1Data.html.name: Eth1Data
Structs/Eth1Data.html.abstract: A vote on recent data the Eth1 chain.

Structs/Attestation.html.name: Attestation
Structs/Attestation.html.abstract: Primary message type that validators create for consensus.

Structs/AttesterSlashing.html.name: AttesterSlashing
Structs/AttesterSlashing.html.abstract: Beacon attesters can be slashed if they sign two conflicting attestations where conflicting is defined by

Structs/Deposit.html.name: Deposit
Structs/Deposit.html.abstract: Represents incoming validator deposits from the eth1 chain deposit contract.

Structs/ProposerSlashing.html.name: ProposerSlashing
Structs/ProposerSlashing.html.abstract: Beacon block proposers can be slashed if they signed two different beacon blocks for the same epoch.

Structs/VoluntaryExit.html.name: VoluntaryExit
Structs/VoluntaryExit.html.abstract: Message type that allows a validator to voluntarily exit validation duties.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
